name: MegaETH Community hangout Prague - hosted by Showdown
short_description: Try a new game, chat with founders, and win a Fluffle NFT whitelist spot at this community hangout.
description:
🎮 Try a new game, chat with founders, win a Fluffle 🎮

📝 Important Info:

* 📅 May 28th, 6:00 PM - 10:00 PM CET
* 📍 Second Culture, Delnicka 475/43, Prague 🇨🇿 (formerly Parallel Polis)
* 🎁 Fluffle NFT whitelist challenge
* 🥂 First 50 guests receive a free drink!

This event is proudly supported by **MegaETH!**

**Showdown** is a digital card game in development, a member of Mega Mafia, the accelerator of MegaETH labs.

Drop by to chat with like-minded people, have a drink and try a cool game in development. We've planned a competition for the FluffleNFT whitelist + a talk from a proper genius.

DM @ondrejstrasky on Twitter or Telegram to register for The Fluffle challenge, first come, first serve.

The event is **open** to everyone, but capacity is limited, please sign up!

⏰ Agenda:

* 6:00 PM - 6:30 PM: Check-in
* 6:30 PM - 6:40 PM: Opening Word - Ondrej Strasky - Showdown founder
* 6:45 PM - 7:45 PM: The Fluffle Challenge - Beat a founder in Showdown, get a Fluffle whitelist spot! 🏆
* 8:00 PM - 8:30 PM: Filip Siroky - GP at MitonC, youngest CERN employee
  * Topic: "Blockchain Scaling: The Endgame" 🚀
* 8:30 PM - 10:00 PM: The Fluffle Challenge continues

🔷 About MegaETH:

MegaETH is the first Real-Time Blockchain, capable of streaming transactions at 100,000 transactions per second with millisecond-level responsiveness. Its near-instant performance unlocks fully onchain applications that can finally match the experience of best-in-class web2 apps while delivering on the promises of decentralization. 🐰 ⚡

🃏 About Showdown:

Showdown is a digital card game developed on MegaETH. It's designed by former #1 ranked Hearthstone and Magic the Gathering players. Showdown is 1v1 poker with a twist, featuring collectible action cards. Players build decks full of cards that can swing the tide of the game at any moment.
